Mastergram

Posted on 07 Sep 2011 by Anthony Kim

Tenement Penthouse, 1941 by Weegee, filtered through Instagram. From Mastergram, a site devoted to ‘remarkable photos made better (or worse) using Instagram’. Horrifying.

Tags: photography, horror
